title: Harry Redknapp talks Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy feud
text:
Harry has weighed into the Coleen and Rebekah feud

Now former football manager Harry Redknapp has weighed in on the ongoing feud between Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy.

The I’m A Celebrity winner is a drop in the ocean of celebrities that have shared their thoughts on the melee, just days after Wayne Rooney’s wife Coleen accused Rebekah of providing fake stories to the press. All of which Jamie Vardy’s wife has vehemently denied.

Now Harry has added his two cents, insisting he only cares about reading up on what Wayne and Jamie are up to, believing the two WAGs were merely after publicity.

He does love to tell it how it is.

‘They seem to be getting plenty of publicity. I suppose that’s what they like, really,’ Harry told Mirror Online this week.

It’s the showbiz clash of the year (Picture: Getty/ITV/Rex)

‘When I was in football, it was only the footballers we used to read about.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘We played football and it was the footballers.’

He continued: ‘We didn’t have WAGs or whatever they’re called now. They weren’t around in my day.’

Insisting he cares not for reading about the lives of the footballers’ wives over their on-field prowess, Harry added: ‘I’m only interested in reading about Jamie Vardy or Wayne Rooney.

‘I’m not interested in what their wives are doing, to be truthful.’

Coleen shared a statement to social media

Rebekah was on holiday with her family in Dubai when Coleen made her accusations last Wednesday, writing on Instagram that she had suspected the WAG of providing stories and so set up an elaborate sting to expose Rebekah.

Last week 33-year-old Coleen took to social media as she wrote: ‘For a few years now someone I trusted to follow me on my personal Instagram account has been consistently informing The Sun newspaper of my private posts and stories.

‘There has been so much information given to them about me, my friends and my family – all without my permission or knowledge. After a long time of trying to figure out who it could be, for various reasons, I had a suspicion.

Rebekah denied selling stories in a post on Twitter (Picture: Twitter)

‘To try and prove this, I came up with an idea. I blocked everyone from viewing my Instagram stories except ONE account. (Those on my private account must have been wondering why I haven’t had stories on there for a while.)’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Coleen continued: ‘Over the past five months I have posted a series of false stories if they made their way into the Sun newspaper. And you know what, they did! The story about gender selection in Mexico, the story about returning to TV and then the latest story about the basement flooding in my new house.

‘It’s been tough keeping it to myself and not making any comment at all, especially when the stories have been leaked, however I had to. Now I know for certain which account/individual it’s come from.

‘I have saved and screenshotted all the original stories which clearly show just one person has viewed them. It’s…… Rebekah Vardy’s account.’

Mum-of-four Coleen has yet to post the alleged screenshots as Rebekah fired back in her own statement: ‘As I have just said to you on the phone, I wish you had called me if you thought this. I never speak to anyone about you as various journalists who have asked me over the years can vouch for.

‘If you thought this was happening you could have told me & I could have changed my passwords to see if it stopped. Over the years various people have had access to my Insta and just this week I found I was following people I didn’t know and have never followed myself.’

Advertisement

The reality star continued: ‘I’m not being funny but I don’t need the money, what would I gain from selling stories on you? I liked you a lot Coleen and I’m so upset that you have chosen to do this, especially when I’m heavily pregnant.

‘I’m disgusted that I’m even having to deny this. You should have called me the first time this happened.’

It’s since been claimed Rebekah had hired forensic investigators to look at her Instagram for any hacks.
